name: WNYCFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listener-supported WNYC is the home for independent journalism and courageous conversation on air and online. Join us for our two-minute news briefings, updated hourly.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
